00085     // muscle model index is not used in OpenSim, but is
00086     // stored here so that it can be written to a SIMM
00087     // muscle file if needed.
00088     PropertyInt _muscleModelIndexProp;
00089     int &_muscleModelIndex;

00093 
00094     // used for scaling tendon and fiber lengths
00095     double _preScaleLength;
